Connector Compatibility

Molex Compatible Cable Assembly

Complete range of Molex-compatible cable assemblies offering the same quality and reliability as genuine Molex connectors at 30-50% lower cost. Direct from our ISO 9001 certified factory.

Why Choose Molex Compatible Solutions?

Cost Savings

Significant cost reduction without compromising quality or performance compared to branded alternatives.

100%

Fully compatible with existing Molex housings, headers, and mating connectors.

Rapid prototyping and production from our dedicated manufacturing facility.

Quality & Compatibility Assurance

Dimensional Precision

Our compatible connectors are manufactured to exact dimensional specifications ensuring perfect mating with Molex housings and headers.

Material Quality

High-quality materials with UL94V-0 flame rating and RoHS compliance for safety and environmental compliance.

Electrical Performance

Current and voltage ratings meet or exceed Molex specifications for reliable power and signal delivery.

100% Testing

Every assembly undergoes continuity testing, pull testing, and visual inspection for consistent quality.

Applications Using Molex Compatible Connectors

Power Supply Units

PSU internal wiring, power distribution, and cable assemblies for various power applications.

Industrial Controls

PLC systems, motor controls, and automation equipment with high power requirements.

LED Lighting

LED driver connections and power delivery for high-power LED arrays and fixtures.

Automotive Electronics

Automotive infotainment, dashboard modules, and vehicle control systems.

Telecommunications

Network equipment, power delivery, and internal wiring for telecom hardware.

Computer Hardware

Motherboard power connectors, peripheral internal wiring, and computer power supplies.
